feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
